name: WE_ARE_ALL_CONNECTED
description: WE_ARE_ALL_CONNECTED 29/03/2021 The art piece “WE_ARE_ALL_CONNECTED” is configured as an art performance which highlights contemporary cryptovalued, globalized, pandemic world charachteristic. Writing on banknotes the message “we are all connected”, the date of the release in the money circulation system and a dot on the europe map which indicates the place it has been released. Travelling, the banknote, as a physical blockchain signature
